translation.en: Fuck yes.
You need a towel, miss.
I need a drink, Brian, but I'd settle for a towel, thank you.
translation.es: Necesito un trago, Brian, pero acepto la toalla, gracias.

translation.en: That closet is magic.
Oh, it's just the basics really, miss.
When the apocalypse comes, I hope I'm with you.
translation.es: Cuando llegue el apocalipsis, espero estar contigo.

translation.en: - It would be my pleasure. -
Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.
translation.es: Me alegra saber que la suerte la acompañó en el juicio de Butler.

translation.en: - What do you mean luck? -
I don't know how you do it, miss.
Anything decent come in?
There is something in your pigeonhole. Next- level stuff, I'd say.
translation.es: Hay algo en su casilla. Algo muy bueno, diría.

translation.en: Intriguing. I'll take a look.
Shall I wait?
No. You should go.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do?
Yes, there is, Brian.
Have a glorious weekend.
There you go, madam.
- Champagne? - Thank you.
- Hi, Sophie. - Hello, darling. Hi.
- Mrs Whitehouse. How are you? - Oh hello.
- What could be bad on this beautiful day? -
translation.es: ¿Qué podría estar mal en este hermoso día?

translation.en: Hello.
- There she is. - Hello, hello.
- Where's your handsome half? - That is a very good question.
translation.es: - ¿Y tu media naranja? - Qué buena pregunta.

translation.en: He promised he would leave the constituency on time for once, but…
translation.es: Prometió que se iría temprano de la circunscripción, pero…

translation.en: - How's the birthday boy? - In denial.
- Thank you. - Enjoy your night.
- Hello. - I don't like the number 44.
translation.es: - Hola. - No me gusta el número 44.

translation.en: Oh, but 44 is the luckiest number in ancient Egypt.
translation.es: Era el número de la suerte en el antiguo Egipto.

translation.en: - Highly associated with wealth and wisdom. - Is that true?
translation.es: - Asociado con la riqueza y la sabiduría. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: No. I just made it up.
- Cheeky Sophie. - Happy birthday.
You have half your whole life ahead of you.
translation.es: Tienes toda la vida por delante.

translation.en: We are lucky.
- Where's James? - Let me find out.
- Happy birthday, Mark. - Excuse me. Sorry.
- Lucy. - Ellie, darling.
- Hello. - You've reached James Whitehouse.
Please leave your name and number. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.es: Deja tu nombre y número. Te llamaré lo antes posible.

translation.en: My darling man, where the fuck are you?
I counted.
I stood on the kerb, and I counted.
translation.es: Me paré en el bordillo y conté.

translation.en: And the little green man flashed for a mere five seconds.
translation.es: Y el hombrecito verde parpadeó solo cinco segundos.

translation.en: - Well, that's not enough time, is it? - No, it's not, Minister.
translation.es: - No es suficiente tiempo, ¿no? - No, ministro.

translation.en: I mean, I think they decided that pedestrian crossings
translation.es: Creo que decidieron que los cruces peatonales

translation.en: only needed a second per metre.
translation.es: solo necesitan un segundo por metro.

translation.en: Now, I know that you do have more important things to consider,
translation.es: Sé que tiene cosas más importantes que considerar,

translation.en: but show me an old bird who could manage that.
translation.es: pero ninguna vieja puede cruzar así.

translation.en: First of all, show me an old bird, Mrs Murray.
translation.es: Primero, yo no veo a ninguna vieja.

translation.en: And I take the safety of my constituents personally.
translation.es: Me importa mucho la seguridad de mis electores.

translation.en: What I want for my family is what I want for Mrs Sibyl Murray of Thurlsdon.
translation.es: La señora Murray de Thurlsdon me importa tanto como mi familia.

translation.en: We'll write a letter.
- Right away. - Thank you very much indeed.
- Got everything? Okay. - Yes, sir.
Straight home, please.
- Sure. - Thank you.
- Would you go back? - To Corsica? In a heartbeat.
It was the most relaxing holiday of my life.
translation.es: Fueron las vacaciones más relajantes de mi vida.

translation.en: James taught the kids how to sail, and I sat on the beach and remembered that I knew how to read.
translation.es: James les enseñó a los niños a navegar, y yo recordé que sabía leer.

translation.en: - Four novels. Heaven. -
Oh. Speak of the devil.
I'd be happy to die in Corsica, as a matter of fact.
translation.es: - Yo moriría en Córcega. - Yo casi muero.

translation.en: I nearly did die in Corsica.
translation.es: - Yo moriría en Córcega. - Yo casi muero. SURGIÓ ALGO. TE VEO EN CASA.

translation.en: I didn't know about this thing called anaphylactic shock.
translation.es: No había oído del shock anafiláctico.

translation.en: Yes, it was before I knew about my shellfish allergy.
translation.es: Aún no sabía de mi alergia a los mariscos.

translation.en: Three bites of shrimp. My face…
translation.es: Mordí un camarón y mi cara…

translation.en: Sorry. I have to go.
…it blew up like a balloon. It was absolutely… It was just enormous.
translation.es: …se hinchó como un globo. Estaba enorme. Se me cerró la garganta…

translation.en: - My throat closed off, I got sick… - Sophie?
translation.es: …se hinchó como un globo. Estaba enorme. Se me cerró la garganta… Sophie.

translation.en: What's going on?
James can't make it. There's been some sort of emergency,
translation.es: James no vendrá. Hubo una emergencia.

translation.en: which usually means a debate about noise pollution, but…
translation.es: Suele ser un debate sobre contaminación…

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Absolutely. Yes.
- Well, then you should stay. - I can't. I heard from Krystyna.
translation.es: - Entonces, quédate. - No puedo. Me escribió Krystyna.

translation.en: She's not feeling well, so I have to take over with the kids.
translation.es: No se siente bien, debo encargarme de los niños.

translation.en: This was so lovely. Thank you.
That was rather embarrassing.
I invented three separate excuses in less than 30 seconds on your behalf.
translation.es: Inventé tres excusas en menos de 30 segundos por ti.

translation.en: James?
You owe me.
I've fucked up, big time.
Does she have a last name?
Lytton.
Olivia Lytton.
You've probably met her. She's one of my aides.
translation.es: Seguro la conoces. Es una de mis asistentes.

translation.en: - Administrative? - Parliamentary researcher.
So she's new?
Relatively.
And young?
It had been going on for about five months.
I broke it off two weeks ago, right after the party conference.
translation.es: La dejé hace dos semanas, después de la conferencia del partido.

translation.en: It meant nothing.
I was flattered.
It was just sex.
Not that there's ever been anything wrong with that part of us. You know that.
translation.es: No porque eso anduviera mal entre nosotros, lo sabes.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Soph.
There's more.
You're not telling me just to tell me
translation.es: No me lo dices solo porque sí.

translation.en: to unburden yourself.
There's more.
- Is she pregnant? - No. God, no.
The story is about to break.
translation.es: La historia saldrá a la luz.

translation.en: - When? - Tonight.
The Mail is splashing it tomorrow. Online, late tonight.
translation.es: Saldrá en The Mail mañana. Hoy en internet.

translation.en: Chris Clarke's on his way over.
He's coming here? Now? We have to get ahead of this.
We have to figure out how to protect our children from it.
translation.es: Debemos pensar cómo proteger a nuestros hijos.

translation.en: We have to do both.
Can't believe I haven't started my Christmas shopping yet.
translation.es: Yo aún no empecé con mis compras navideñas.

translation.en: Well, you can buy me a drink and save on gift wrap.
translation.es: Cómprame un trago y ahorra en papel de regalo.

translation.en: Hello!
Called to see if you fancied a drink.
- It sounds like you did. - Join us.
I'm not in the mood for a crowd.
Well, you should be. I heard about the Butler result.
translation.es: Deberías. Me enteré del resultado de Butler.

translation.en: - The truth won today. -
No, no, no. Kate Woodcroft won today.
Not many lawyers could've pulled that one off.
translation.es: No muchos abogados lo habrían logrado.

translation.en: It's the Christmas season. Come and join us.
I hate Christmas.
I would have had you over tonight, but Felicity decided to stay in town.
translation.es: Te invitaría a pasar la noche, pero Felicity se quedará en la ciudad.

translation.en: Oh, how unfelicitous.
See you soon?
Of course.
Have fun.
Top Tory cheats with aide, that's the headline.
translation.es: Conservador tiene amorío con su asistente, ese es el titular.

translation.en: I mean, it's not brilliant, but could be worse.
translation.es: No es brillante, pero podría ser peor.

translation.en: God knows these knobheads are capable.
translation.es: Dios sabe que estos idiotas son capaces.

translation.en: PM's friend in trysts in the corridors of power. Don't like that.
translation.es: Amigo del primer ministro tiene amorío en los pasillos del poder. No me gusta.

translation.en: Oh for fuck's sake.
Britain's most fanciable MP
had sex with his female aide in a lift in the Commons.
translation.es: tuvo sexo con su asistente en un ascensor en la Cámara de los Comunes.

translation.en: Uh, James Whitehouse, a Home Office minister and confidant of the prime minister,
translation.es: James Whitehouse, ministro y confidente del primer ministro,

translation.en: uh, conducted his affair with his parliamentary researcher in the Palace of Westminster.
translation.es: tuvo un amorío con una de sus asistentes en el Palacio de Westminster.

translation.en: The married father of two also shared a room
translation.es: El padre de familia también compartió habitación

translation.en: with stunning Olivia Lytton, 28, during the party conference.
translation.es: con la imponente Olivia Lytton, 28, durante la conferencia del partido.

translation.en: Well, that was fucking stupid. Literally.
translation.es: En la que te metiste. Literalmente.

translation.en: So she's a classic woman scorned. Is that it? I can't speak for her.
translation.es: - ¿Es la clásica despechada? - No puedo hablar por ella.

translation.en: But did you speak to her leading up to this?
- Did you know this was coming? - No.
translation.es: - ¿Sabías que esto iba a pasar? - No.

translation.en: He used her…
Basically, your priority from now on is to rebuild trust all around.
translation.es: Tu prioridad de ahora en más es recuperar la confianza de todos.

translation.en: The party conference is not funded by taxpayers.
translation.es: Los contribuyentes no financian la conferencia.

translation.en: Think anyone's making distinctions?
Johnny Public bankrolls your salary as a minister in Her Majesty's government.
translation.es: La sociedad financia tu salario como ministro del gobierno.

translation.en: No one's paying you to bang the help in a House of Commons lift.
translation.es: No te pagan por cogerte a tu asistente.

translation.en: - She has a brilliant mind. - That'd make a better headline.
translation.es: - Ella es brillante. - Ese sería un mejor titular.

translation.en: Minister bangs brainy bombshell.
translation.es: El ministro se coge a una hermosura aguda.

translation.en: - Alliterative and to the point. - Christ almighty, Chris.
translation.es: - Conciso y con rima. - Dios mío.

translation.en: I don't give a fuck about Johnny Public.
translation.es: Me importa un carajo la sociedad.

translation.en: Johnny Public's gonna be reading this in the Daily Mail.
translation.es: La sociedad leerá esto en el Daily mail.

translation.en: Do you want to have a little chat about it?
Johnny Public will support me. I'm sure of it.
translation.es: La sociedad me apoyará, no lo dudo.

translation.en: I expect she'll be dubbed the ravishing researcher.
translation.es: Seguro la apodarán la investigadora imponente.

translation.en: You're not gonna be springing any surprises on us?
Such as?
Well, announcing that you're leaving. Putting on your side of the story.
translation.es: Como anunciar que te vas o dar tu versión de los hechos.

translation.en: Do you need to ask?
- Of course I do. - Of course she's not leaving.
translation.es: - Por supuesto. - Claro que no se irá.

translation.en: - Sorry. I didn't mean to-- - Of course I'm not leaving.
translation.es: - Lo siento. No quise… - Claro que no me iré.

translation.en: We've been married for 12 years. We share two children.
translation.es: Llevamos 12 años casados. Tenemos dos hijos.

translation.en: Why would I throw all that away over a stupid mistake?
translation.es: ¿Tirar todo por la borda por un error estúpido?

translation.en: And there's no need to offer my resignation?
The PM will make it clear if he wants that, but he doesn't abandon his old friends,
translation.es: El primer ministro decidirá eso, pero no abandona a sus amigos,

translation.en: especially not his closest, and you're one of those.
translation.es: en especial a los más cercanos, y tú eres uno de ellos.

translation.en: Says so right here.
Besides, sex doesn't have to kill a career these days.
translation.es: Además, el sexo no arruina una carrera hoy en día.

translation.en: You might even gain some fans amongst the older male voter.
translation.es: Podrías ganar adeptos entre los votantes mayores.

translation.en: I mean, they're hardly gonna argue with some touchy- feely,
translation.es: Digo, no van a espantarse por un poco de sexo,

translation.en: some fun on the side with a filly.
She's a woman, not a horse. I'm trying to help your husband.
translation.es: - Es una mujer, no un caballo. - Intento ayudar a tu esposo.

translation.en: And you, for that matter.
translation.es: Y a ti, si vamos al caso.

translation.en: Well, try not to reveal too much of yourself in the process.
translation.es: Trata de no exponerte mientras lo haces.

translation.en: Someone's coming out punching. That is very good.
translation.es: Alguien está combativa. Eso es muy bueno.

translation.en: That is exactly what we need right now.
Uh, so listen. No details, but also no denials.
translation.es: Escuchen. Nada de detalles, pero tampoco lo nieguen.

translation.en: Denials have a way of coming back to bite you on the arse.
Therefore, do not elaborate.
The sum of your script is this, deep regret, brief affair,
translation.es: El resumen es este: te arrepientes mucho, duró poco,

translation.en: prioritise your family and constituents,
translation.es: priorizas a tu familia y electores.

translation.en: deflect and dismiss, but never deny. Got it?
translation.es: Desviar y desestimar, pero nunca negar. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: - Who's there? - Me.
Em?
- Were you sitting on the stairs? - How long?
- Not long. - You should be asleep, darling.
I heard voices.
- Hello, Emily. - Remember Mr Clarke?
Let's get you back to bed. Come on.
What's that Paul Newman quote?

translation.en: Why go out for hamburgers when you've got steak at home?

translation.en: Listen to me, you little prick. This isn't a fucking joke, it's my life.
translation.es: Idiota, esto no es una broma, es mi vida.

translation.en: I love her. Got it?
Oh, mate. I'm only here because the PM told me to be.
translation.es: Yo solo vine porque me envió el primer ministro.

translation.en: Quite. So do your fucking job, mate,
and help me fix it.
Is it over?
Yes.
Yes.
Five months?
It was, as you said, a stupid mistake.
translation.es: Como dijiste, fue un error estúpido.

translation.es: En la conferencia del partido. ¿Dónde más?

translation.en: Work mostly. Usually late at night.
translation.es: En el trabajo, por lo general. De noche.

translation.en: What, on desks?
In the broom cupboard?
On the right honourable leather sofa?
Did the whole office know?
We were careful.
Apparently not.
Hotel rooms?
A few times.
- How many? - Well, I didn't count.
I would like to have a number in mind.

translation.en: - I would find that helpful. - I don't know. 20, 30.
She doesn't mean anything to me. It was just sex.
translation.es: Ella no significa nada para mí. Fue solo sexo.

translation.en: - Nothing's just sex. - But it was, Soph.
translation.es: - Nada es solo sexo. - Pero lo fue, Soph.

translation.en: It was.
I've been so stressed out at work these past many months.
translation.es: Estuve muy estresado estos últimos meses.

translation.en: I'm honoured to have the immigration portfolio, but it is impossibly complex and literally life and death.
translation.es: Tener la cartera de inmigración es muy complejo, es de vida o muerte.

translation.en: I haven't even told you a fraction of it.
translation.es: No te conté ni una parte de lo que implica.

translation.en: She… she was just there.
I was weak.
For the life of me, it's a mystery how it even start--
translation.es: Te juro que ni sé cómo comenzó…

translation.en: That's enough.
I'm going to bed.
- Oh my God. I'm sorry. - Sorry, James.
- Minister. - Olivia.
Can I get you a cab?
Yes.
Or you could get me another drink.
I'll keep this simple.
Before you stands a man who made a mistake.
translation.es: Ante ustedes está un hombre que cometió un error.

translation.en: My brief affair with a colleague
translation.es: Mi breve amorío con una colega

translation.en: showed disrespect to my marriage,
translation.es: fue una falta de respeto a mi matrimonio,

translation.en: to my family, and to the trust of my constituents.
translation.es: a mi familia y a la confianza de mis electores.

translation.en: As I sometimes say to my children,
translation.es: Como a veces les digo a mis hijos,

translation.en: under vastly less serious circumstances,
not okay.
Forgiveness and understanding must be earned,
translation.es: El perdón y la comprensión deben ganarse, así que no me atrevo a pedirlos todavía,

translation.en: so I don't presume to ask for those yet, but I do ask for patience
translation.es: El perdón y la comprensión deben ganarse, así que no me atrevo a pedirlos todavía, pero sí pido paciencia

translation.en: as I try to repair the damage done to my beloved family
translation.es: mientras trato de reparar el daño que le ocasioné a mi querida familia

translation.en: and my esteemed constituents.
Thank you all.
That's all for today!
- Hello there. - Hi, Ellie.
Hi. It's nice to see you.
It's nice that it's not last week.
translation.es: Al menos ya pasó una semana.

translation.en: Apologies for bailing on Mark's birthday. Oh, don't give it another thought.
translation.es: - Lamento haberme ido del cumpleaños. - Olvídalo.

translation.en: We'll be fine.
Of course you will.
Sometimes, I think sex is the root of all evil.
translation.es: A veces, creo que el sexo es la causa de todos los males.

translation.en: That's rubbish. Sex is great.
At least, our sex is great. It's never been a problem for us.
translation.es: Al menos, el nuestro. Nunca fue un problema para nosotros.

translation.en: You're lucky.
And a very forgiving person.
Not really.
Like the man said, he made a mistake.
translation.es: Como él dijo, cometió un error.

translation.en: A fling is just that.
Bye!
You're right.
If mere infidelity were enough to ruin a marriage,
translation.es: Si una mera infidelidad arruinara un matrimonio,

translation.en: there wouldn't be an intact family in this whole bloody school.
It's an eyeball. She can see that.
translation.es: - Es un globo ocular. - Ya lo sabe.

translation.en: - Bye. - Can't wait to show Daddy.
translation.es: - Adiós. - Quiero que lo vea papá.

translation.en: - Prime Minister. - Afternoon.
- Prime Minister. - Afternoon.
- Prime Minister. - I believe he's in?
Yes, indeed. I'll--
- James. - Tom.
Can we get you anything?
Does anyone have chocolate?
Chocolate? Anything sweet. Just a nibble.
We've got Percy Pigs.
Oh cheers.
Still eating sweets, Mr Creosote?  Just a wafer- thin mint.

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you for not hanging me out.
translation.es: Gracias por no darme la espalda.

translation.en: Yet.
- Well, this is the worst of it? - Yes.
I wish she hadn't been on your payroll.
translation.es: Ojalá no hubiera sido tu empleada.

translation.en: I wish I had a time machine.
- How's Sophie? - Pretty great.
Oh, she's always been that.
Forgiving.
I guess she's always been that too.
No.
This was the first time in 12 years of marriage, I swear on my life.
translation.es: Esta fue la primera vez en 12 años, lo juro.

translation.en: Don't look so serious.
The past is the past as far as I'm concerned.
translation.es: Lo pasado pisado, por lo que a mí respecta.

translation.en: - Prime Minister, your diary-- - I know. Thank you.
I was planning to introduce the amendment to the immigration bill.
translation.es: Presentaré la enmienda al proyecto de ley de inmigración.

translation.en: - With your blessing. - Yes. Amend away.
translation.es: Presentaré la enmienda al proyecto de ley de inmigración. - Con tu aprobación. - Sí, hazlo.

translation.en: Now listen. Be good to that wife of yours.
You might think the public are looking to me,
translation.es: El público no me estará mirando a mí,

translation.en: but they'll be looking to her.
- Mummy, what's a Libertine? - Beg your pardon?
It says here Daddy was a Libertine.
translation.es: Aquí dice que papá era un libertino.

translation.en: - What are you doing with that? - It was in the study.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces con eso? - Estaba en el estudio.

translation.en: I told you to stay out of the study. Don't be a snoop.

translation.en: - Sorry. What would you like for dinner? - Pizza?
Pizza?
Good idea. Let's do it.
- But, Mummy, what is a Libertine? - Mmhmm?
Um, it was a club that Daddy was in at Oxford with Uncle Tom.
translation.es: Un club en Oxford al que papá y el tío Tom pertenecían.

translation.en: But what does the word mean?
It means someone who likes to have a good time. Would you like a pepperoni or plain cheese?

translation.en: - Plain cheese, please. - Okay. I'll call when it's ready. Krystyna?
translation.es: - Solo queso, por favor. - Te llamaré cuando esté lista. ¿Krystyna?

I'm a Libertine.
No. You're not.
Why not?

Let's go! Libertines!  Go, Libertines!
Sophie!
Sophie!

She lives outside of the library!

translation.en: …and, while I will go to my grave

translation.en: respecting the opinion of the honourable member from Morewood and Barnsford,
translation.es: …si bien me iré a la tumba respetando la opinión de la honorable miembro de Morewood y Barnsford,

translation.en: I must dispute her objections to this amendment.

translation.en: The honourable lady is concerned about fairness.

translation.en: This proposed change to the immigration bill

translation.en: represents the most equitable approach to both skilled and low- skilled workers

translation.en: - It is more inclusive, not less! -
Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.es: si he aprendido algo en mis 44 años en la Tierra es esto:

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.es: Si parece pato, camina como pato y grazna como pato,

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
And what about a duck caught having an affair
translation.es: ¿Y si al pato le descubren un amorío

translation.en: with a duckling in his employ?
translation.es: con una patita a su cargo?

translation.en: What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.es: ¿Qué debería hacer un pato así, honorable señor?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yes.
Swim.
Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
translation.es: ¿Más allá del amorío con su asistente a la que le dobla en edad

translation.en: and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
translation.es: y de cogérsela en el ascensor a media mañana?

translation.en: I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.es: Decía en la Cámara. Y no le dobla en edad.

translation.en: - Looks it. - Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.es: ¿No estaba segundo en la lista de políticos guapos?

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
translation.es: Nunca visto de un miembro del Partido Conservador.

translation.en: Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician on our side of the Chamber.
translation.es: Además, es el político más talentoso de nuestro lado de la Cámara.

translation.en: Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd, it could start to make your loyalty look ill- advised.
translation.es: Pero si lo llenan de denuncias, tal vez no debería seguir apoyándolo.

translation.en: It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.es: El público se preguntará en qué se basa, señor.

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
translation.es: El famoso pastel de carne de James Whitehouse.

translation.en: - Isn't that Granny's recipe? - Only better.
translation.es: - ¿No es la receta de la abuela? - Mejorada.

translation.en: This is version 2.0. We haven't had this in ages.
translation.es: - Es la versión 2.0. - Hace mucho no comíamos esto.

translation.en: I make it all the time.
Really? Is that why you had Tuppence walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
translation.es: ¿Sí? ¿Por eso Tuppence tuvo que asistirte tres veces?

translation.en: I suppose it has been quite a while.
translation.es: Bueno, supongo que pasó bastante tiempo.

translation.en: Krystyna.
It's yummy, Daddy.
- Good. - Napkins.
Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
So yummy.
- Would you like some wine? - Please.
- Krystyna, would you some? - No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
- To what? - To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
translation.es: Es la mujer más maravillosa que conozco.

translation.en: - To Mummy. - To Mummy.
- Sorry. - No.
- - So I read your draft proposal.
translation.es: - Leí el borrador de tu propuesta. - ¿Y?

translation.en: I think it's cracking.
Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
translation.es: Qué pena. Los conservadores dicen que es demasiado humana.

translation.en: What do you think? Can I have some more?
Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.es: ¿Qué opinas? ¿Me das más? Dios, lo siento. Lo siento.

translation.en: - - Oh, now it's empty.
Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
translation.es: Eso explica cómo te aprovechaste de mí.

translation.en: Oh yes. Sorry about that.
Where are you?
At the office.
At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.es: Es una locura. Ven a beber algo.

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
translation.es: Por el amor de Dios, vive un poco, Woodcroft.

translation.en: I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
translation.es: Te alegrará saber que estoy bebiendo whisky.

translation.en: Good.
Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.es: Los padres de un niño de mi clase sabían lo que le pedí a Papá Noel.

translation.en: - Where are Ed and your kids? - He took them to a movie.
translation.es: - ¿Y Ed y los niños? - Fueron al cine.

translation.en: So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.es: Así que tengo, más o menos, una hora más de paz, silencio y lavado.

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.es: Estaré distraída hasta terminar con esto.

translation.en: What is it?
The usual…  …but quite high- profile.
translation.es: Lo de siempre. Pero de alto perfil.

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one. Of course you should.
translation.es: - No sé si debería aceptarlo. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.es: No seas ridícula. Puedes contármelo a mí.

translation.en: Love you.
Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
translation.es: Gracias, Kenneth. Vuelvo en un rato.

translation.en: Yes.
Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
translation.es: ¿No es la esposa de James Whitehouse?

translation.en: - Sophie. - Mrs Whitehouse.
Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair? Mrs Whitehouse.
translation.es: - ¿Algunas palabras sobre lo de su esposo? - Señora Whitehouse.

translation.en: Sophie!
James.
- Hi, it's Whitehouse. - Hi.
- Can I take your coat? - Thanks.
- Really? - I know.
Hello.
- Hello. - Hello, darling.
- You remember Lawrence Hughes- Davies? - Of course.
- How are you? - Very good.
- Good. Yeah. - Listen, I was just saying to James.
translation.es: - Bien. - Recién le decía a James:

translation.en: I've witnessed every kind of weather
translation.es: he sido testigo de todo tipo de clima

translation.en: in the three and a half decades I've been here.
translation.es: en los 35 años que he estado aquí.

translation.en: This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.es: Esto no califica como chubasco. Ni siquiera como un desajuste.

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear.
translation.es: Es solo un poco de lluvia.

translation.en: And look…  …it's passed.
Now, boys will be boys,
but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.es: pero seguro este aprendió la lección.

translation.en: My wife always said, Once, okay. Twice, go away.
translation.es: Mi esposa dice: Una vez te perdono, dos, te abandono.

translation.en: I left it at once.
Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
I'm sorry about that.
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
translation.es: Pensé que no me afectaría venir,

translation.en: but it's bringing it all back.
The affair?
No.
No. My fear.
About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
translation.es: Creí que lo habíamos aclarado hace mucho.

translation.en: I am not my mother.
I will not live my mother's life.
translation.es: No viviré la vida de mi madre.

translation.en: I will not be the long- suffering spouse.
Once, okay. Twice, go away. Fuck off.
translation.es: Una vez te perdono, dos, te abandono. Vete al carajo.

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
translation.es: En especial, en la pecera de la política.

translation.en: I always thought that our marriage was, um…
…superior.
Immune.
Was that the lift?
What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
Was that one of the sites of your affair?
translation.es: ¿Fue uno de los lugares de tu amorío?

translation.en: The one that made the headlines?
Jesus.
I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.es: Soph, a pesar de lo horrible que fue esta semana, y de todo lo que te hice pasar,

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.es: Tener la certeza de que eres la persona con la que quiero morir.

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.es: Lo único que me importa es arreglar las cosas contigo.

translation.en: You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.es: Me pararé aquí mismo y les diré a todos que renuncio.

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
translation.es: Si el futuro no te incluye a ti, Sophie Whitehouse,

translation.en: the future is shite.
You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
You'll get home earlier this way.
translation.es: Así llegarás a casa más temprano.

translation.en: Come on, James!
Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.es: Si fuera un poco tonto, sería justo.

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards,
translation.es: Pero no, a tu novio le tocaron todas las mejores cartas,

translation.en: including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
translation.es: incluso la distinción deportiva de Oxford.

translation.en: Adonis.
What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for lord.
translation.es: Viene de la palabra cananea para señor.

translation.en: He's the god of beauty and desire.
translation.es: Es el dios de la belleza y el deseo.

translation.en: Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
I'm going to marry that boy one day.
translation.es: Algún día me casaré con él.

translation.en: You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows.
translation.es: Pero no sabe que lo sabe.

translation.en: Yes, mate.
Oh, James. Nice to see Sophie here.
translation.es: James. Qué bueno ver a Sophie aquí.

translation.en: Thank you.
- Mr Whitehouse. - Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis. This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
translation.es: Sargento detective Willis. Y la detective Constable Rydon.

translation.en: We've been trying to contact you. But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
translation.es: - Lo estábamos buscando. - Nadie podía contactarlo.

translation.en: Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.es: Apagué el celular. Tomaba el té con mi esposa.

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know.
- May I ask what this is about? - Olivia Lytton.
What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.es: Tenemos preguntas en relación con una acusación.

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
translation.es: - ¿Una acusación de qué? - De violación, señor.

translation.en: An allegation of rape.
How the mighty fall
